ResearchProjectDef.label: compact paste dispenser
ResearchProjectDef.description: Revisit the previous design of a paste dispenser to greatly reduce the space occupied by this machine. The new model will require a more skilled builder.

ResearchProjectDef.label: in-wall dispensers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Shrink the occupied volume to an absurdly small amount, making paste dispensers fit into walls at the cost of a bit less efficient ingredient consumption. Perfect for feeding prisoners!

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced paste dispensers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into dietology and molecular analysis to create even more effective ways of automated food production.
